title: Blue Sky
fullDescription: I do a deep down gaze at the deep blue sky and wonder at its relaxing power. But before I am able to conclude anything, I fall asleep. And so I try again.

title: Cherry Tree
fullDescription: The prettiness of cherry tree invigorates the soul. I seek an understanding of why the cherry fruit, from such a pretty tree, tastes so aweful! I try to stomach the cherry, but I cannot stomach the though of it. So, I try another day

title: Waterfall
fullDescription: The waterfall is so huge and pretty. I wonder if it natures way of spreading bacteria around in droplets.
